featured.text: After retirement, Mr. Wang _____ ice skating, which he had always loved but had not had time for. (A) appealed to (B) took to (C) related to (D) saw to 15.

definition.zh_def: 滑冰，指在冰面上或其他平滑表面上滑行的運動或活動。
definition.en_def: The action or sport of gliding on skates over a surface, typically ice or a smooth floor.
definition.example: She enjoys skating at the local ice rink every winter.
